item.title: Nicole add a quote by Buddha
item.description: "Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace." -- Buddha

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Nicole add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Nicole add a quote by A.A. Milne
Nicole add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Nicole add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Nicole add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu
